posts.post_content:
I was about to say that this is notably Magic's only female Dwarf as of now. But that's not true.  
There has been [Dwarven Trader](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dwarven Trader) since Homelands (although she does look like a human on the artwork), and since the creature type update we even got a legendary female freaking Dwarf Vampire with [Irini Sengir](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Irini Sengir)!
posts.html:
I was about to say that this is notably Magic's only female Dwarf as of now. But that's not true.
There has been Dwarven Trader since Homelands (although she does look like a human on the artwork), and since the creature type update we even got a legendary female freaking Dwarf Vampire with Irini Sengir!
